Name: NDoc
Creator: Jason Diamond  Jean-Claude Manoli  Kral Ferch

Name: [empty]
Creator: possibility of extended customization
Latest stable version: highlighting and linking of generated doc

Name: Document! X
Creator: customizable HTML based templates  custom comment tags
Latest stable version: internal links and links to .NET framework documentation

Name: Doxygen
Creator: with XSLT
First public release date: caller and callee graphs  dependency graphs  inheritance diagrams  collaboration diagrams

Name: HeaderDoc
Creator: Custom headers  footers  code coloring  and other CSS styles in individual pages. Project-wide TOC is generated from a user-defined template.
Latest stable version: Configurable syntax highlighting/coloring with automatic linking to symbols in declaration  ability to manually link to symbols in discussion  etc.
Software license: Provides warnings if tagged parameters do not match code  parsed parameters included in XML output and Doxygen-style tagfile (-D flag in 8.7). Partial C preprocessor support with -p flag. Support for #if/#ifdef control over documentation inclusion using the -D and -U command-line flags.

Name: Imagix 4D
Creator: customizable through style sheets and CSS
First public release date: linked hierarchy and dependency graphs for function calls  variable sets and reads  class inheritance and interface  and file includes and interface  intra-function flow charts
Latest stable version: fully cross-linked project-wide  including all hierarchy and dependency graphs  metrics tables  source code snippets  and source files
Software license: full semantic analysis of source code  including parameter types  conditional compilation directives  macro expansions

Name: mkd
Creator: Customisable for all type of comments
Latest stable version: all general documentation; references  manual  organigrams  ... Including the binary codes included in the comments.

Name: perldoc
Creator: Extend the generator classes through Perl programming.

Name: pdoc
Creator: overridable mako templates
Latest stable version: source code syntax highlighting  automatic cross-linking to symbol declarations

Name: phpDocumentor
Creator: Smarty-based templates
Latest stable version: cross reference to generated documentation  and to php.net function reference

Name: Sphinx
Creator: 10 themes; Jinja2 templating; Python plugins
First public release date: several in sphinx-contrib  e.g. using aafigure  actdiag  Google Chart  or gnuplot
Latest stable version: Table of Contents  Index; cross referencing; syntax highlighting with Pygments
Software license: custom objects (such as functions and classes)

Name: Visual Expert
Creator: documentation content and styles customizable
First public release date: Class inheritance  call trees  dependencies (impact analysis)
Latest stable version: internal links between classes  methods  variables  tables  columns...

Name: VSdocman
Creator: full customization for all output formats  templates for MSDN-like output  custom XML comment tags
First public release date: linked graphical class diagrams  class inheritance tree
Latest stable version: internal links and links to .NET framework documentation

Name: YARD
Creator: customizable Ruby templates
Latest stable version: internal classes/modules cross-referenced and Ruby source highlighted
